bug.author: coreyching
bug.summary: Broken Link Inside the Friction Log Google Doc
bug.description:
Thank you for submitting a TensorFlow documentation issue. Per our GitHub policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests, and build/installation issues on GitHub. The TensorFlow docs are open source! To get involved, read the documentation contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue / ## Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Inside the Friction Log Document: <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HVG3t-mgGZKU4iMeguTWGejbnQ54qUTXwdCFkA5xHG0/edit>https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HVG3t-mgGZKU4iMeguTWGejbnQ54qUTXwdCFkA5xHG0/edit</denchmark-link>
There is a broken link to the "Bug / Performance" template: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/00-bug-performance-issue.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/00-bug-performance-issue.md</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
I see there are two templates - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new?labels=type%3Aperformance&template=80-performance-issue.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new?labels=type%3Aperformance&template=80-performance-issue.md</denchmark-link>
: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new?labels=type%3Abug&template=00-bug-issue.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new?labels=type%3Abug&template=00-bug-issue.md</denchmark-link>
The friction log should update these links in the google doc,

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/coreyching>@coreyching</denchmark-link>
please share the source of this document, the link from tensorflow or github where this document is present.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/coreyching>@coreyching</denchmark-link>
please confirm if the source is from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/community/blob/master/sigs/build/tensorflow-testing.md>this link</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/coreyching>@coreyching</denchmark-link>
please update on the above comment.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/coreyching>@coreyching</denchmark-link>
As there is a pr to monitor your request, moving this issue to closed status
